cards.rules_text: Whenever Congregation Aspirant or an artifact you control enters, scry 1.
When Operahouse Gossip enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Flash

During your turn, Mechanical Racer has first strike.
When Bardic Historian enters, return target instant, sorcery, or Saga card from your graveyard to your hand.

{R}{W}{U} ARTIFACTS 
     {R}{W} GO-WIDE Engineer ways to kill your foes fast using your wide array of artifacts!
     {W}{U} BUILDINGS Develop your buildings to generate value nobody can compete with.
{U}{R}{G} SAGAS/REGALE
     {U}{R} CONTROL Accrue long-term advantage by consistently casting noncreature spells.
     {R}{G} AGGRO Regale your prowess to your opponent’s face by singing and slinging spells!
{G}{U}{B} DELIRIUM 
     {G}{U} RAMP Fill your graveyard to help paint more mana into casting powerful spells!
     {U}{B} TEMPO Use your late-night motivation to empower evasive threats and disrupt your opponent.
{B}{G}{W} PREPARATION
     {B}{G} LIFEGAIN Feast on food with your creatures by paying off lifegain synergies.
     {G}{W} TOKENS Prepare your opponent a twenty-course meal of plants and pain!
{W}{B}{R} EXPLOIT
     {W}{B} ENTERS Blink and reanimate your actors to give their enters triggers an encore.
     {B}{R} SACRIFICE The show must go on, even if it means sacrificing a few friends.
When Inspirational Performer enters, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.

Flying
When Skystone Seraph enters, you gain 1 life and scry 1. If you control two or more artifacts, you gain 3 life and scry 3 instead.

Vigilance
Exploit [i](When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)[/i]
When Colossal Puppetry exploits a creature, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Exile target creature.
Scry 2.
Forgefire Spray deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If you control two or more artifacts, Forgefire Spray deals 4 damage to that creature instead.

Flying, ward {3}
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control another creature, an artifact, another enchantment, a land, and a planeswalker, you win the game.

Legacy {R}{W}{B}

[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. If it’s a token, put an additional 
+1/+1 counter on it.
[-2]: Create your choice of a 1/1 green Plant creature token or a Food token, then create both.
[-3]: Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of noncreature tokens you control.

[+2]: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
[+1]: You gain 3 life and draw a card.
[-3]: Return target instant, sorcery, or artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-7]: Search your hand and/or library for an instant, sorcery, or artifact card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

The Skystone Congregation’s foundry focuses on finding artistry in everyday convenience.

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Swaying Smorgasbord deals combat damage to a player or dies, create a Food token. You may have it become an X/X creature in addition to its other types, where X is the amount of life you’ve gained this turn.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Discard a card.
Draw a card.
​

cards.rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Mill five cards, then put any number of artifact and/or enchantment cards milled this way into your hand.
Create a 1/1 blue Illusion enchantment creature token with flying.
Put X +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature, where X is the number of other artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. If excess damage was dealt this way, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]

When Dramatic Organ enters, up to two target creatures can’t block this turn.
{3}{R}, Sacrifice Dramatic Organ: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Choose three —
• Permanents target player controls gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Untap each nonland permanent you control.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target player gains 4 life and draws a card.
• Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Exploit [i](When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control exploits, it gains double strike, lifelink and haste until end of turn.

Trample
[i]Preparation[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve gained life or created a token this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Cookie Snatcher.

Vigilance
[i]Preparation[/i] — Once on each of your turns, when you gain life or create a token, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Preparation[/i] — Once on each of your turns, when you gain life or create a token, put a +1/+1 counter on Kitty Connoisseur.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
Create a tapped Treasure token.
Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an instant, sorcery, or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
​

cards.rules_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
{1}{G}{W}, Sacrifice a noncreature token: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

dwarf

cards.rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
The Rejection of the Monarchy deals 3 damage to any target.
Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.
Create a Treasure token.

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Equip {1}

When Skystone Sculptory enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 colorless Sculpture artifact creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”
Whenever you attack with one or more artifact creatures, you may put a double strike counter on one of them.
cards.special_text:
Whenever Skystone Sculptory becomes tapped, you may put a brick counter on it.
{1}, {T}: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Chisel with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.
 Built 1+
{3}{W}, {T}: Create a tapped 0/0 colorless Sculpture artifact creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”
 Built 3+
{1}, {T}: Create a tapped token that’s a copy of an artifact token you control.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Avian Augmenteers enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 2.
Whenever an artifact you control enters, put your choice of a vigilance, menace, trample, or lifelink counter on up to one target Vehicle.

Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains “Whenever this creature fights, it fights up to one target creature you don’t control.” Then it fights up to one target creature you don’t control.
cards.notes: Creativity doesn’t ignore any arts, however martial they may be.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When Dramatis Personae enters, you may create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink. If you don’t, each player sacrifices a creature. Then repeat this process three more times.

Exploit, exploit, exploit [i](When this enters, for each exploit, you may sacrifice a creature. Exploits trigger sequentially.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control exploits, exile the top card of target opponent’s library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them or from your graveyard onto the battlefield with a deathtouch counter and a lifelink counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
